item.description: Structure Fire; INC#0025; 12:40AM; 2646 S Western Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BvagtE; Adams-Normandie; KNOCKDOWN: 46 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes. With a commercial building only inches away, the quick and aggressive actions of firefighters prevented the blaze from extending and damaging any other structures. There are no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC18 E15 E203 E215 E226 E26 E29 E94 RA34 RA826 SQ21 T15 T26 T3; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0025; 12:21AM; 2651 S Hobart Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BvagtE; Adams-Normandie; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing and additional buildings exposed on two sides. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC18 E15 E203 E215 E226 E26 E29 E94 RA34 RA826 SQ21 T15 T26 T3; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Hiker - Hoist Operation; INC#0580; 10:00AM; 8310 La Tuna Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oInkEa; Shadow Hills; LAFD Aeromedics located the injured 30 year old male mountain biker who is alert and oriented. The patient sustained, what appear to be on initial assessment, non-life threatening injuries. LAFD Air Ops will conduct a hoist operation and transport to the hospital. No further details.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 BC12 E260 E77 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA77 RA874 RH114 T60; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0348; 06:57AM; 563 N Heliotrope Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q8AfLc; East Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters remained in the offensive mode as they made entry and extinguished the fire on the 1st floor before making their way up to the 2nd floor and attic. Officers are inspecting the attic of the exposed building to ensure no extension occurred. Crews will remain on scene conducting overhaul operations. No further details.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E220 E235 E52 E6 RA6 T20 T35; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0348; 06:37AM; 563 N Heliotrope Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q8AfLc; East Hollywood; Two story (reportedly vacant) single family dwelling with heavy fire showing. Initial reports of additional structures exposed. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E220 E235 E52 E6 T20 T35; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
TEST ONLY; INC#0000; 02:45PM; Test ONLY;; Test. Test Only. LAFD Systems Test. No Action Required. Test Complete MS; West Bureau; LAFD Admin

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0698; 11:20AM; 9101 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OY6j4i; #GramercyPark; One-story row of commercials, smoke showing. First-arriving companies located a fire inside, burning contents only, and quickly extinguished the flames in 13 minutes before involving any structural components. No injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC4 E233 E264 E64 E66 E95 RA66 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Multi-Patient Traffic; INC#0912; 02:45PM; NB 405 Fwy x Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Je6Kpq; #Brentwood; A total of 4 LAFD ambulances transported one or more patients (each) to a local hospital.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; E109 E99 RA102 RA39 RA78 RA862 RA88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Multi-Patient Traffic; INC#0912; 01:35PM; NB 405 Fwy x Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Je6Kpq; #Brentwood; At least two vehicles collided, resulting in 7 patients (conditions: 1 serious, 1 moderate, 5 fair). One LAFD paramedic ambulance transported to the hospital (with possibly multiple patients, final # transported unconfirmed). Traffic has been negatively impacted in both directions of travel on the 405 freeway. CHP Log 1280. Nothing further.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; E109 E99 RA102 RA39 RA78 RA862 RA88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

#LATraffic - Structure Fire ; INC#0226; 05:33AM; 5249 W Century Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OFvdF3; #Westchester - #LAX Area; Los Angeles Firefighters have safely extinguished a non-injury fire in the parking structure of a hotel near Century Boulevard and La Cienega Blvd at 5:48 this morning. Spectator slowing and the presence of fire apparatus blocking nearby lanes of both Century and La Cienega Boulevards, has led to considerable traffic in the area. Motorists headed to Los Angeles International Airport before 8:00 AM today should anticipate congestion in that area, and consider an alternate route to LAX. LAFD operations should be complete by 8:00 AM. Please monitor traffic reports on news radio.; FS 95; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC13 BC4 E205 E295 E5 E51 E95 RA857 RA95 T5 T95; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey
